original_title: Studies of Clouds over the Pacific Ocean
overview: I used the films of clouds taken by meteorologist researchers in 1965. Looking down? Or looking up? The existence of the universal clouds that go back and forth between the past and the present. Smooth movement of the cloud visualized by interval shooting. This is an experiment on the relation between « work » and « data ». It was exhibited at Hokkaido University Museum.
title: Studies of Clouds over the Pacific Ocean
